Item ID1658

The emerald necklace is made by using a gold bar on a furnace with an emerald and a necklace mould in your inventory. It requires a Crafting level of 29 and provides 60 experience when made.

The emerald necklace can be enchanted into a binding necklace by casting Lvl-2 Enchant. This requires a Magic level of 27, a cosmic rune and three air runes.

Emerald necklaces can be sold to Grum's Gold Exchange in Port Sarim, starting at 997 coins each if there are none in stock.
